title: Lead a Research Group in Germany
snippet: For example, the Helmholtz Association supports its Investigators Groups for periods of five years with at least 1.5 million euros, while Fraunhofer Attract provides up to 2.5 million euros over five years for a group leader position with three to four new members of staff, materials and other investments. The largest funding programme for research groups is the Emmy Noether Programme run by the Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft. In 2023, 500 research groups at universities and research institutions were funded by the DFG through this programme.
